title: Riot Points
body: Is Riot still doing the free 400 rp when users reach level 3? I started playing recently, but my friends that have been playing for awhile said that I was supposed to get free 400 rp. I looked this up and apparently, you are supposed to get it when you hit level 3, but I'm currently level 10 and nothing happened.

replies.body: With the release of Hextech Crafting, we've replaced the new player 400 RP bonus with a special new player Hextech Chest.  Check out our announcement and reasoning on the change [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp)
